name: LIGHTNING ⚡
description: Lightning ⚡ what is it? Lightning ⚡ is a mod for GTA, this mod radically changes GTA! Vegetation ... changed, roads ... changed, graphics ... changed, cars ... changed, GTA ... changed. I'm a 3D artist, maker and developper. I made everything in gta and in the digital world. I love to create, that's why I'm an engineer. I try to import unknown technologies into GTA, which creates a new game, a new gameplay, a new world, a revolution. No more installing thousands of mods of all kinds to get a great game. Here you have everything! The realization of such a project is hard but I have motivation and a team with me! We just need you, and you just have to click to get ̶G̶T̶A̶ ̶V̶I̶ uh no Lightning ⚡
